about_the_game:
Play Falos, learn to read the first 100+ words for over 100+ languages.

Four Different Gameplay Modes


  • Gorilla Jumper: Navigate through levels by jumping onto the correct emojis that match the displayed words. Precision and quick thinking are key as you leap from one emoji to the next.
  • Dragon Snake: Embrace the classic snake game with a twist. Guide your character towards the right emojis while avoiding your growing tail, ensuring each move aligns with your language learning goals.
  • Bird Adventure: Take to the skies in a side-scrolling escapade. Flap the wings of your bird to soar among the clouds, diving through the correct emojis that match the words below.
  • Endless Gorilla Runner: Test your reflexes in an endless runner format, where you must jump across multiple levels to snag the right emojis. Avoid the wrong ones to keep your streak alive and score high.

Educational Video Game


  • Diverse Vocabulary: From animals and colors to essential travel items, expand your linguistic repertoire in a fun and memorable way.
  • Multiple Languages: With over 100 languages featured, Falos offers an unparalleled opportunity to explore new languages or strengthen existing skills.
  • Engaging Challenges: Each game mode presents unique challenges that cater to different playstyles, ensuring a fresh and exciting learning experience every time.

Progress


Advance through levels by matching the correct emojis with their corresponding words. Beware of the incorrect choices, as they cost you a life. Success hinges on accuracy and speed, with each level upping the ante and enriching your vocabulary.

Design Philosophy


Falos is designed to make language learning accessible and entertaining. By integrating learning into familiar gaming formats, players of all ages can enjoy the thrill of gaming while absorbing new words in another language. Whether you're a seasoned polyglot or a curious beginner, Falos offers a unique blend of education and entertainment.

Join the Adventure


Prepare yourself to have fun in the colorful and captivating world of Falos, where every jump, flap, and dash brings you one step closer to linguistic mastery. With its innovative approach to language learning, Falos is not just a game—it's a gateway to global communication and understanding.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.15
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Falos

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB, OpenGL 3+
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Falos: Learn to read 100+ words in 100+ languages while playing a game. A game where you match words to emojis across four different play styles.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Indonesian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Armenian, Azerbaijani, Basque, Belarusian, Bosnian, Catalan, Croatian, Estonian, Filipino, Galician, Georgian, Gujarati, Hausa, Hebrew, Hindi, Icelandic, Igbo, Irish, Kannada, Kazakh, Khmer, Kinyarwanda, Kyrgyz, Latvian, Lithuanian, Luxembourgish, Macedonian, Malay, Malayalam, Maltese, Maori, Marathi, Mongolian, Nepali, Persian, Scots, Serbian, Sindhi, Sinhala, Slovak, Slovenian, Swahili, Tajik, Tamil, Tatar, Telugu, Turkmen, Urdu, Uzbek, Welsh, Xhosa, Yoruba, Zulu
